title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 380-8.4 - Records of dose to individual members of the public
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 380-8.4 - Records of dose to individual members of the public

State Regulations

Each person subject to this Part must maintain records
sufficient to demonstrate compliance with the dose limit for individual members
of the public specified in section
380-5.1
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
380-8.4

Amended

New

York State Register April 25, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 17, eff. 5/10/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
